channel.title: Icons on AInI
channel.description: Recent content in Icons on AInI

item.title: Tableau filters - Part II
item.description: Following from the previous post on “Tableau filters - Part I”, let’s get down to the nitty gritty how tos! We start with a graph and a filter, simple. The following graph shows the percentage of people per state that agree with each of the statements. Each state is a bar, the more on the right the bar is the bigger percentage of the population in that specific state agrees with that sentence.
